1.content:
You honestly can't remember how to ended up drowning in the ocean, your lungs filling with seawater as your vision went black and you lost conciousness. However it came to be, the next thing you know, you feel the heat of the sun warming your skin and wet sand squishing beneath your body, as someone is gently compressing your chest, causing you to vomit the salt water from your lungs as you turn on your side and violently expel the brine from your body.

Whilethis was going on, your eyes had been closed this whole time. You sit up and repeatedly cough as you hear a female voice ask "Are you alright?" You nod without opening your eyes and say between coughs. "Yes. Thank you, whoever you are." Your savior giggles and replies "Well, I had to do something. I found you washed up here and thought you were dead. But you still had a pulse, so..."

Only now do you open your eyes and look at your rescuer. Your eyes widen in shock and surprise as you see that she is...

(Note: Whichever choice you pick, that will be what the rest of the island's inhabitants will be.)
1.title: Welcome to the island

info.brief_description: You find yourself stranded on an island full of women, who want you as their king!
info.description:
You read the description, so you know what to expect.

Rules:

No gross stuff like farts or anything like that.

I will allow fetishes like expansion or maybe even a little vore, just don't go crazy with it.

No killing characters.
